ygData.subject: Re: [neat] New E-print: Neuroevolution Offers New Approach to Deep Learning
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Josh, thanks for the link to your paper and for highlighting that it also aims to evolve features.  It does appear that the DDFA idea could be complementary
